Sensibility Testbed could not be found on your handset. Press the "Install" button to install.
Removable Storage Device is not present or is not mounted correctly. Please remount the device and restart the application.
Sensibility Testbed is being installed. Please wait...
Thank you for making the world a better place by installing Sensibility Testbed!
Email me a copy of this consent form

You are invited to take part in a research study that will help researchers understand mobile devices and develop new applications and algorithms. This study will be conducted by [Principal Investigator (PI)], Polytechnic School of Engineering, New York University. If you agree to participate in this study, you will be asked to download the Sensibility Testbed app from Google Play Store and install it on your mobile device.  

Before agreeing to participate in this study we suggest that you read two documents for research participants / device owners. The first describes the purpose of our testbed: Terms of Participation for Device Owners. If you would like to know more details about our research, please refer to Technical Information for Device Owners.

Participation in this study will involve minimal action from participants. Data will be collected from devices’ sensors, in the background, as long as participants do not stop the Sensibility app. Participants/device owners may stop any data collection experiment on their own device or leave the Sensibility Testbed research at any time, for any reason, without any consequence.

The risks of participating in this research are minimal. The Sensibility Testbed features software that isolates experimenters’ code so that it cannot interfere with the functioning or security of your device. We may also use filters to limit the level of detail or information included in the collected data.

Although you will receive no direct benefits, this research may help the investigator improve current network protocols or systems and to implement or evaluate new services [See “Potential Benefits to Device Owners” at purpose of study].

 

Confidentiality of your data will be strictly maintained by individual experimenters. The IRB at the experimenter’s home university or research lab will only approve the research once they determine that there is no significant privacy or confidentiality risk to participants. They ensure that any sensor data, if stored, is strictly protected.

 

Participation in this study is voluntary. You may refuse to participate or withdraw at any time without penalty.

If there is anything about the study or your participation that is unclear or that you do not understand, if you have questions or wish to report a research-related problem, you may contact [investigator name] at [PI’s phone number, e-mail, University address] or the faculty sponsor, [faculty sponsor name] at [faculty sponsor phone number, e-mail, University address].

For questions about your rights as a research participant, you may contact the University Committee on Activities Involving Human Subjects, New York University, 665 Broadway, Suite 804, New York, NY 10012 at 212-998-4808 or ask.humansubjects@nyu.edu.

By pressing "Accept", I certify that I am over the age of 18 and the owner of the device that will run the Sensibility app.
